name: Dragoneye
long_description:
Dragoneye helps devs build powerful apps and features that use images and videos. With our cutting-edge AI tech, folks can recognize things in the world with high accuracy and deep granularity, right out of the box. No more arduous process of annotating any training data or doing any machine learning work themselves.

For example, retailers can turn their product images into rich product metadata. With this highly detailed metadata, we help these companies to supercharge their commerce solutions and importantly, drive revenue by enhancing everything from site search to buying analytics.

Overview Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=opRMn48z9dM
one_liner: Helping devs build computer vision models automatically
